thread.title: Jennifer Lopez Breaks Her Silence on Drake - Jennifer Lopez
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lopez Breaks Her Silence on Drake - Jennifer Lopez Grammys Red Carpet

author: Kristina Rodulfo
title: Jennifer Lopez Breaks Her Silence on Drake - Jennifer Lopez
text:
Aside from a cuddly Instagram and real-life PDA , Jennifer Lopez has remained pretty quiet on her and Drake's relationship. The duo, who were first romantically linked at the end of December, reportedly just called it quits . Lopez never spoke out publicly about itâ€“until today on the Grammys red carpet. When Ryan Seacrest asked her if she was rooting for Drake, she said, "Of course. I love Drake. He's so brilliant. Talented. Amazing." She continued, "We made a song together and um..."
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below "Created sparks?" Seacrest interrupted.
With some nervous laughter, she replied, "Yes, absolutely. We hung out. We have a great time. And he's amazing. I have so much love for him." So that's not a total confirmation that they were, indeed, together but...something.
Her face when she got asked about Drake.
